content.rendered:
Recognize why we have conflicts in our professional lives and also with our loved ones. The book offers powerful but effective solutions on how to face conflict in everyday life and also resolve them for living a happier life.

Complete with a diverse set of personal and real-life examples from everyday lives, the book offers key ideas on conflict resolution. Nonflict is inspired by well-known people who are groundbreakers in conflict resolution, who give deep insights into relationship therapy, positive psychology and change management.

Every chapter with definitions, key points and exercises for your own assessment of life situations, will teach you how Conflict can be turned into Nonflict for professional and personal success.

Learn the essentials of how to turn Conflict into Nonflict for a more fulfilling life.
